rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3123%, E3006%, F20021, F2004%, F2005%}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CDS1001}

description: This unit introduces communication design processes relative to the fundamental principles of typography, image, layout manipulation and time-based design. An understanding of how communication design enhances the human experience is initiated in this unit through observation, critical enquiry, interpretation and the creation of visual and interactive forms. Students will utilise typography both as a communicative and expressive tool. Historical and contemporary examples of visual communication, typography and time-based media will be examined, analysed and discussed, providing the opportunity for students to appreciate and develop skills in typography, page layout, motion graphics and digital media design.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
